segments.text: I can’t help but chuckle at the sight of the boy, risking everything for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a classic scene of childhood rebellion, and there’s a part of me that loves it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, watching him teeter makes my stomach drop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman remains blissfully unaware, completely absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her indifference to the spill at her feet is almost infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how easily things could go wrong in an instant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This charming domestic scene is drenched in potential disaster, and no one sees it.
segments.speaker: PAR
